actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to allow adequate time for citizen participation in public hearings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 by increasing the period of time during which interested members of the public may comment on proposed preliminary railway system plans. Increases the time limit within which the United States Railway Association shall submit a final railway system plan under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to allow adequate time for citizen participation in public hearings, and for other purposes.
